- The next best is ♦9 (D9), which is also not present.
- The remaining diamonds (D1, D2, D3) will be prioritized over hearts and clubs due to their suit.
- Other red cards (hearts) will be considered next, but they do not have the same rank bump.
- Black cards will be the least prioritized.
